content: hate friends and fellow crafters today I thought I'd talk about light let's hit
the table pull out of 2.5 D tiles and miniatures and we'll talk about the
feeling that light can give at the table here we have a traditional 2.5 D tile
and it's brightly lit from above and we had can have our adventurers come on the
tile and you can see it's you know it's it's nice but it doesn't give that
really kind of dungeon effect where you're just kind of crawling through
this dark environment so let us doom the light and not totally
out but dim it and then we can use a like a spotlight to put on the table and
put it on the characters maybe someones carrying a light or something and you
can still see the dungeon the hallway but it really focuses your attention on
the characters and gives you that kind of feeling that they're in this crawling
through this dark environment or you think that's a neat effect and they're
just in this pool of light and it's kind of similar to listening to music while
you're doing while you're dungeoneering it gives you that kind of background and
you can you can inspire moods by the background
I think the same with light you know the light kind of you know that pool of
light just kind of gives you an idea that you're in this dark environment you
know trudging through this dark environment hey friends I'll see you
next time with some more fun ideas also make sure to check out the links in the
description of the video to check out some resources I have with the DMS craft
and take care and happy crafting
